version_description:
- 30 brand new levels in new Winter Chapter!
- 12 new funny outfits for Snail Bob
- New jigsaw puzzle
Fixed bug when the game crashes on start on some devices.

- Added full-screen mode for the new devices.
- Fixed the several bugs, when some players weren't able to spin the roulette, restore lives and use the hints to reveal the hidden stars.
We fixed a bug some users faced the game crashed in the first level when the alarm rang and Bob woke up
We fixed a bug some users faced the game crashed in the first level when the alarm rang and Bob woke up
